text:
#Pence Admits He Messed Up During His Visit With Mayo Clinic Coronavirus Team

“I didn’t think it was necessary, but I SHOULD HAVE WORN A MASK,” Pence said during a #FoxNews virtual town hall on Sunday

#MOG
